title: Fiora needs the rework undone.
body:
Let's bring the old Fiora back and everybody who disagrees with me has to fight me in an MMA cage to win the argument. 

I think that's fair. 

Since I'm outnumbered by people who don't even care about Fiora I think you should all have to fight to keep the new Fiora.

Surely I'll beat you all.

replies.body:
God no. Grab hydra and press R for free quadra? No thanks.

For anyone that doesn't know what that ghastly thing was, think Master Yi's Q on steroids.
Tell me where. I love the rework.

> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvEzUzoF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-19T02:11:55.690+0000)
>
> Tell me where. I love the rework.

Let's do this...  I can get us a fight in Spokane through Sik Jitsu at Northern West Casino.   Ask Rick Little on Face book when we can get a date. Tell him you wanna fight the 1st president of Cascadia.  He'll know who your talking about.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvEzUzoF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-19T03:08:53.455+0000)
>
> Let's do this...  I can get us a fight in Spokane through Sik Jitsu at Northern West Casino.   Ask Rick Little on Face book when we can get a date. Tell him you wanna fight the 1st president of Cascadia.  He'll know who your talking about.

I'll be there.

New Fiora is annoying and strong, but old Fiora was just god awful broken, i saw way to many 1v5 penta kills from old fiora. 
here is a video of old Fiora incase you dont know https://youtu.be/Q-s51RQq3TA
